name: Zombie Siege (itch) (Japes)
description:
Manage a group of zombie apocalypse survivors in their hideout. Face waves of the undead each night, and by day, prepare.

Improve your shelter,  sharpen your skills. Do you dare venture out to forage for food? You may never return!

Based on a submission for ludum dare 50.  If you're looking for that, it's here: https://japes.itch.io/zombiedefense

Changes since LD version:

  • more events
  • changed the way accuracy works
  • "crit" shoot ability
  • "build mode" with 1 thing to build
